path: artifacts/ChesterCoin Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.ChesterCoin: contracts/ChesterCoin Full Smart Contract Security Audit/ChesterCoin

findings.title: Out of Gas
findings.description: The functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can lead to OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if the excluded addresses list is long.
findings.location: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_GetCurrentSupply` in the ChesterCoin smart contract
